thread.title: Liberals Bash Ivanka Trump On Twitter For Enjoying Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl Performance
thread.title_full: Liberals Bash Ivanka Trump On Twitter For Enjoying Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl Performance

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Liberals Bash Ivanka Trump On Twitter For Enjoying Lady Gaga’s Super Bowl Performance
text:
07:51pm February 7, 2017 Do you like this article? 
In 2017, liberals have made it clear that conservatives aren’t allowed to do pretty much anything without getting mercilessly mocked. 
It’s officially time to stop ever using the word “tolerant” to describe the modern day left. 
Most people seem to agree that Lady Gaga did a great job at the Super Bowl. 
Personally, I was thrilled that she opted against lecturing the millions of Americans who didn’t vote for Hillary Clinton. 
Apparently, Ivanka liked the performance too. 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 6, 2017 
Guess how liberals felt about that one… @IvankaTrump @ladygaga incredibly lyrics yes. I hope you listened 
— nihal mehta (@nihalmehta) February 6, 2017 @IvankaTrump @ladygaga Explain to your dad her message. That we are all welcome, that we all belong. He stands for the opposite. He is hate. 
— NastyWoman Book Club (@NastyWomanBooks) February 6, 2017 @IvankaTrump How can you praise that horrible woman who so openly and brazenly hates your father? I'm so disappointed in you. #Pray4DJT
